mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subscription_events_ext ( subscription_id, event_type, user_type, plan_id, product_id, version, account_id, organization_id, tenant_id, account_record_id, tenant_record_id ) VALUES ( #{subscription_id}, #{event_type}, #{user_type}, #{plan_id}, #{product_id}, #{version}, #{account_id}, #{organization_id}, #{tenant_id}, #{account_record_id}, #{tenant_record_id} )
mapper.select: select C.*,D.count_total from (SELECT B.plan_id,B.version,count(*) as count_by_version from ( SELECT plan_id,product_id,version,subscription_id from (SELECT * from subscription_events_ext WHERE organization_id = #{organization_id} AND subscription_id is not null AND product_id = #{product_id} AND version = #{version} AND (user_type = 'CHANGE' OR user_type = 'CREATE') ORDER BY id DESC) A GROUP BY A.subscription_id )B GROUP BY B.plan_id)C join (SELECT count(*) as count_total, B.plan_id from ( SELECT plan_id,product_id,version,subscription_id from (SELECT * from subscription_events_ext WHERE organization_id = #{organization_id} AND subscription_id is not null AND product_id = #{product_id} AND (user_type = 'CHANGE' OR user_type = 'CREATE') ORDER BY id DESC) A GROUP BY A.subscription_id )B GROUP BY B.plan_id)D on D.plan_id = C.plan_id
